casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 1, 2011

[Cite as 02/01/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-427.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0731. In re C.P.

Athens App. No. 09CA41, 2010-Ohio-1484. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Athens County.

Upon review of appellee’s merit brief, it is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that the appendix to appellee’s merit brief be placed under seal.
